ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:

- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
name: xpdtools

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "xpdtools" %}
{% set version = "0.8.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "b7b3412a4137df3ef60ba93740614039819615265e4e833c8b1a7de15b631d19" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: http://github.com/xpdAcq/{{ name }}/releases/download/{{ version }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
  entry_points:
    - image_to_iq = xpdtools.cli.process_tiff:run_main

requirements:
  build:
    - python >=3
    - pip 
  run:
    - python >=3
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - scikit-beam
    - pyyaml
    - pyfai
    - rapidz
    - fire
    - pims
    - fabio
    - numba
    - matplotlib-base
    - tqdm
    - scikit-learn
    - tomopy


test:
  imports:
    - xpdtools
    - xpdtools.tools
    - xpdtools.cli.process_tiff
  commands:
    - image_to_iq -- --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/xpdAcq/xpdtools
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Analysis Tools for XPD'

  doc_url: https://xpdacq.github.io/xpdtools/
  dev_url: https://github.com/xpdAcq/xpdtools

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - st3107
